trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 與這個自動化對等相關聯的項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 建立指定之項目的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 指定項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> 的快速鍵組合。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key combinations for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之項目的描述性名稱。

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 指定控制項模式的值列舉。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" /> <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> 值，則為支援控制項模式的物件，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Hides all items that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> 中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 未啟用。
